mapper.insert: insert into examinationapplication (eAName, eIId, dId, eAStatus, rId) values (#{eAName}, #{eIId}, #{dId}, #{eAStatus}, #{rId})
mapper.select: select eAId, eAName, eIId, dId, eAStatus, rId from examinationapplication where eAId = #{eAId}
select eAId, eAName, eIId, dId, eAStatus, rId, eAResult from examinationapplication where rId = #{rId}
select eAId, eAName, eIId, dId, eAStatus, rId, eAResult, beginTime from examinationapplication where rId = #{rId} and eAStatus = #{eAStatus}
mapper.update: update examinationapplication set eAStatus = #{eAStatus} where eAId = #{eAId}
update examinationapplication set eAStatus = #{eAStatus}, beginTime = #{beginTime} where eAId = #{eAId}
